name: Factotum 90
description: You’re in deep space and something’s collided with the ship. Main power is offline and you’re trapped. It’s lucky you have access to this walker control terminal. It’s a little old but with these two robots and some clever thinking you might be able to get power back online and save the day.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: x86 Dual Core, 2.4Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X9 GPU with 1GB RAM (Shader Model 3) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any compatible sound card Additional Notes: Xbox 360 Gamepad or compatible
